tkeyBackup.authenticateWith: Authenticate with a separate Backup Phrase
tkeyBackup.copyShareNote: Note: This backup phrase containts 1 part of your authentication factors. Keep it somewhere save as a part of your account recovery in future.

tkeyCreate.greatCreated: Great! You are all set up!
tkeyCreate.walletAddressDesc: This is your unique address, similar to a bank account number used to receive payments.

tkeyCreateAdd.tkeyIs3: that allows you to retrieve your private key when you lose access to your login.
tkeyCreateAdd.tkeyManaged: Your tKey account is managed by your login (e.g. Google), your device, and a password. Set up your account and access it with any two of the authentication factors during each login.
tkeyCreateAdd.tkeyUseful: This is useful for users who would like to have more control over their account, especially when they have a significant sum in their wallet in future.
tkeyCreateAdd.tryTkeyDesc: A separate account with added security

tkeyCreateDone.theDefaultAccount: You will use this account whenever you sign in. You can change this anytime in your settings.

tkeyCreateSetup.authViaBrowser1: Authentication via browser is limited to the cookies stored.
tkeyCreateSetup.iUnderstand: I understand that I need at least two authentication factors to access my tKey account. Otherwise,  I lose access to my tKey account.
tkeyCreateSetup.passwordRules: Must contain at least 10 characters. At least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number
tkeyCreateSetup.youHaveSufficient: You have sufficient authentication factors for your tKey account. Bravo!
tkeyCreateSetup.youMayWantTo: You may want to set up one more authentication factor as a backup.
tkeyCreateSetup.youNeedBackup: You may want to backup on device storage in case you forget your password
tkeyCreateSetup.youNeedBackupPassword: You need to backup on device storage or set up a recovery password to create your tKey account
tkeyCreateSetup.youNeedOneMore: You need one more authentication factor to set up your tKey account.
tkeyCreateSetup.youNeedPassword: You may want to set up a recovery password in case you lose your device.
tkeyCreateSetup.youWouldRequire3: of the following to authenticate and access your tKey account.

walletHome.accountRecoveryDesc: Solerium uses Google/Facebook 2 Factor-Authentication for account recovery.
walletHome.collectiblesDetails1: You have started your first collection.
walletHome.curious: Curious about how to get Tokens?
walletHome.exploreSubtitle: Explore the largest decentralised marketplace for blockchain assets
walletHome.exploreTitle: Get your first item from OpenSea
walletHome.getDigitalDesc: You can share your wallet address with others to receive digital currency and tokens.
walletHome.getFirstCollectible: Get your first Collectible from OpenSea
walletHome.gettingStartedDesc: Here are some key terms to guide you along
walletHome.knowYourWalletDesc: A wallet address is similar to a bank account number. It's a unique combination of letters and numbers that looks like this: 0x09438E46Ea66647EA65E4b104C125c82076FDcE5
walletHome.obNo2Subtitle1: This is your password to verify account ownership. Only you are able to access it. If you lose this, you potentially lose ownership of your account and ALL your money.
walletHome.obNo2Subtitle2: Solerium uses Google/Facebook 2 Factor-Authentication for account recovery.
walletHome.obNoSubtitle1: A wallet address is similar to a bank account number. It’s a unique combination of letters and numbers that looks like this:
walletHome.obNoSubtitle2: You can share your wallet address with others to receive digital currency and tokens.
walletHome.obSetupNo: I do not own digital assets
walletHome.obSetupSubtitle: Select one of the following statements that best describes you.
walletHome.obSetupTitle: Let us get you set up
walletHome.obYesSubtitle1: Send and purchase tokens and collectibles. Import your account to experience the features within your Solerium Wallet.
walletHome.obYesSubtitle2: A feature unique to Solerium' Wallet. Do away with long public addresses. A gmail address is all you need to get that cool asset across to your friend.
walletHome.obYesTitle1: Enjoy features like you have always been
walletHome.obYesTitle2: Send tokens to your friend's gmail
walletHome.privacySecurityDesc: Your Privacy are our top priority
walletHome.privateKeyDesc: This is your password to verify account ownership. Only you are able to access it. If you lose this, you potentially lose ownership of your account and ALL your money.
walletHome.topupDetails1: Good work in completing your first Top up.
walletHome.topupTransactionDetails1: You just made your first transaction.
walletHome.topupTransactionDetails2: You are definitely on the right track!
walletHome.verifyLoginDesc1: A login to this account is detected from a new device.
walletHome.verifyLoginDesc2: Please proceed to your 'Settings' page to view the request.
walletHome.whatIsDesc: Solerium is a key management solution that aims to provide an easy access to services running on Blockchain.

tkeySettings.theSelectedAccount: The selected default account shall be the account displayed when you sign in on a DApp.

walletSettings.changeNetworkError: If you are experiencing issues, please change the RPC endpoint in settings page.
walletSettings.customKey: You will be logged out of your wallet and asked to relogin.
walletSettings.dappPermissionDesc: As a form of security, all transactions require your signature for validation. You may add and allow certain Dapps to transact under certain circumstances.
walletSettings.description: To manage your account security settings, select the link to continue
walletSettings.enterPassword: Input a new password to encrypt your keystore file
walletSettings.explainCrashReport: Solerium collects anonymous data about any crashes that occur to help improve our products and services.
walletSettings.footerBodyText: App.openlogin is an open standard for decentralized user account management on Web3, by Web3Auth

walletTopUp.cryptoDesc: Crypto.com is a secure way to buy cryptocurrency with your credit card. Start by installing their application
walletTopUp.description: is a secure way to buy cryptocurrency with your payment method. Start by entering an amount below to get a quote before making a purchase
walletTopUp.otherModeDesc: and we would try our best to improve and serve you better
walletTopUp.receiveHint: Please prepare your Identity Card/Passport to complete the purchase.
walletTopUp.receiveHintRamp: You need ID verification for top-up more than 1k EUR per transaction or 10k EUR per month
walletTopUp.redirectMessage: You will be redirected to the third party page
walletTopUp.serviceFeeDesc2: for their services in card processing, mitigation and fraud detection
walletTopUp.waitFetch: Please wait while we fetch fresh quote prices.

walletTransfer.clickToAddContact: Click here to add Contact to your Address Book
walletTransfer.error-minimum-amount: Minimum amount of {min} CSPR can be sent.
walletTransfer.fee-edit-base-fee-desc: The minimum fee to process your transaction on the network. It varies based on how busy the network is. The fee is based on per gas of block
walletTransfer.fee-edit-gas-limit-desc: This is the maximum amount of gas provided for a transaction. For ETH transfers, the value is 21,000.
walletTransfer.fee-edit-max-desc: This fee goes directly to miners and incentivises them to prioritise your transaction. Any remaining amount will be refunded. Usually the full amount will be used up. The fee is based on per gas of block.
walletTransfer.fee-edit-nonce-desc: A number that begins with 0, to indicate the sequence of your transaction from your wallet address.
walletTransfer.fee-edit-subtitle2: Your transaction will be priortised by the network when you pay a higher fee.
walletTransfer.fee-error-likely-fail: This transaction is likely to fail as the currently set gas price: {0} GWEI is less than the average gas price: {1} GWEI.
walletTransfer.fee-error-maxfee-high: Max transaction fee is higher than necessary
walletTransfer.fee-error-maxfee-imbalance: Max transaction fee cannot be lower than max priority fee
walletTransfer.fee-error-maxfee-low: Max transaction fee too low for network conditions
walletTransfer.fee-error-maxfee-tooltip: The max transaction fee is the most you’ll pay (base fee + priority fee).
walletTransfer.fee-error-priorityfee-below: Max priority fee must be greater than 0 GWEI
walletTransfer.fee-error-priorityfee-high: Max priority fee is higher than necessary. You may pay more than needed.
walletTransfer.fee-error-priorityfee-low: Max priority fee extremely low for network conditions
walletTransfer.fee-max-transaction-desc: The maximum fee you pay for a transaction. Max Transaction Fee = Base Fee + Max Priority Fee. This includes the fees to process the transaction and the maximum incentive you pay a miner to prioritise your transaction. Any un-used amount will be refunded. The fee is based on per gas of block.
walletTransfer.fee-max-transaction-hint: Recommended rate. To speed up transaction, select 'Edit' to pay more.
walletTransfer.gasEstimateFail: Gas estimation failed. Max fee will be charged.
walletTransfer.gasLimitDesc: This is the maximum amount of gas you're willing to spend on a transaction. A standard ETH transfer requires a gas limit of 21,000 units of gas.
walletTransfer.gasPriceDesc2: is needed to power blockchain transactions
walletTransfer.gasPriceDesc4: is the amount per unit Gas to pay for a transaction. It is measured in ‘Gwei’.
walletTransfer.insufficientBalance: Must be less than your balances
walletTransfer.invalidRecipient: Recipient address should be different from your address
walletTransfer.transferFeeDesc: This is a mandatory processing fee users pay to the Ethereum network for each transaction. A higher fee will speed up the transaction process.
walletTransfer.transferShare: Share this on your favourite social network
walletTransfer.transferSuccessMessage: Your transaction will be completed in {time}
walletTransfer.transferTweet: Hey {address}! I sent you {amount} via @Soleriumlabs. Access it at https://app.tor.us.
walletTransfer.twitterVerifyNote: Please verify if this is the right account
